author: Kevin O'Sullivan and Claire O'Connell
title: PCR versus antibody tests: What’s the difference?
description: PCR ascertains whether the virus is present; antibody tests tell you if you have beaten it
content: There are two main approaches to testing for Covid-19 and they search for different things. The PCR test takes a swab from the back of the nose and throat and looks for presence of the virus itself. The other looks at a blood sample for antibodies generated i… [+1708 chars]
